price: Ва аммо касе, ки номаи [аъмолаш] аз пушти сараш ба ӯ дода шавад
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
